item.title: Will convicted wife killer Scott Peterson get a new trial?
item.description: After California man's death sentence is overturned, there's a renewed push to clear him.

item.title: Scott Peterson: Case in Question
item.description: He was convicted of murdering his pregnant wife. The “other woman” recorded his calls for the prosecution. With his death sentence now overturned ther...

item.title: Lara Trump won't pursue Rubio's Florida Senate seat, she says
item.description: Lara Trump, the daughter-in-law of President-elect Donald Trump, says she's removing herself from consideration for Marco Rubio's Senate seat.

item.title: 2 U.S. Navy pilots eject safely when jet shot down by likely "friendly fire"
item.description: An F/A-18 fighter jet was "mistakenly fired on" by the guided missile cruiser USS Gettysburg, authorities said.

item.title: 12/21: CBS Weekend News
item.description: At least 5 dead, 200 injured in German Christmas market car attack; Chicago elf brings comfort and joy to children in hospitals
